quote: I'll take a potato chip... and eat it!

I am the hope of the universe... I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.

Even if you're weak, there are miracles you can seize with your hands if you fight on to the very end.

To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to the happiness you could have.
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something.

I am neither good nor evil. I am merely balance.
I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... that is my ninja way!
There’s no need to rush. My strongest weapon is my patience.
You’re weak. Why are you so weak? Because you lack hatred.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
When you give up, that's when the game is over.

We are all like fireworks: we climb, we shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even when that time comes, let’s not disappear like a firework, and continue to shine… forever.
Whatever you lose, you’ll find it again. But what you throw away you’ll never get back.

I never go back on my word. That's my nindo: my ninja way!
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something.
I am the hope of the universe. I am the answer to all living things that cry out for peace.
If the king doesn’t lead, how can he expect his subordinates to follow?

People need to be needed by someone in order to live. If you’re not needed, then you’re better off dead.

We don’t die for our friends, we live for them.

Even if we painstakingly piece together something lost, it doesn’t mean things will ever go back to how they were.
Don't believe in the you who believes in me; don't believe in the me who believes in you. Believe in the you who believes in yourself!
No one knows what the future holds. That’s why its potential is infinite.
People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define 'reality'. But what does it mean to be 'correct' or 'true'? Merely vague concepts.
I’m not short! I just live in a big world!
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.
I'm simply one hell of a butler.
I mustn’t run away. I mustn’t run away.
Only a human can destroy a monster.

The world is cruel, but also very beautiful.

We’ll stop caring about the people we love… when we’re dead!
I’m not afraid to die protecting you… because I love you.
I ain’t gonna be buried just yet!
